Generation III.Ruby: Carvanha 's strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this Pok é mon .
Generation III.Sapphire: If anything invades Carvanha 's territory, it will swarm and tear at the intruder with its pointed fangs. On its own, however, this Pok é mon turns suddenly timid.
Generation III.Emerald: Carvanha attack ships in swarms, making them sink. Although it is said to be a very vicious Pok é mon , it timidly flees as soon as it finds itself alone.
Generation III.FireRed: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.

Generation VI.X: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.
Generation VI.Y: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Carvanha's strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this Pokémon.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: If anything invades Carvanha's territory, it will swarm and tear at the intruder with its pointed fangs. On its own, however, this Pokémon turns suddenly timid.

Generation VII.Sun: Each school has its own territory. Any intruders are mercilessly attacked with fangs bared.
Generation VII.Moon: If they scent the faintest trace of blood, they rush to attack en masse. When alone, they're rather cowardly.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: They're such cowards that they won't hunt alone. When five or so of them get together, they suddenly turn ferocious!
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: With its sturdy jaws and fangs, it can easily chomp wooden boats to splinters. It fights with Basculin over food.

Generation VIII.Sword: It won't attack while it's alone—not even if it spots prey. Instead, it waits for other Carvanha to join it, and then the Pokémon attack as a group.
Generation VIII.Shield: These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
